name: MyCompanybyArcBest
0:
”Alexa, ask My Company what is my vacation balance”
”Alexa, ask My Company when is pay day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my company
Developer Terms of Use
des: Introducing My Company by ArcBest! This skill is designed to provide employees with quick and easy access to relevant and up-to-date information. With this skill, employees can use simple voice commands to access their Vacation Balance and Next Pay Day. Get the most out of your work experience with the My Company by ArcBest skill for Amazon Alexa!
